2010 anthar patashaliya wayu rayifal saha wayu pisthola wedi thabime tharagawaliye di kolambaa nalanda widyalaya balaka samastha surathawath kolambaa wishakha widyalaya balika samastha surathawath dina ganna ladi.mema tharagawaliye di balaka anusurathawa kolambaa rajakiya widyalaya dinagath athara thewana sthanaya kolambaa tharstan widyalayata himiwiya.tharagawaliye di balika anusurathawa kolambaa gothami balika widyalaya dinagath athara thewana sthanaya kolambaa dewibalika widyalayata himiwiya.kolambaa nalanda widyalayiya wayurayifal saha wayu pisthola wedi thabime eekakaya magin mema tharagawaliya sanwidhanaya karana lada athara nalanda widyaliya wedi pitiye di pereda (06) dawasa pura meya pawathwini.

jagath kumara mahatha eeye (13 wanida) pawasiya.me hethuwen samanya janathawata naya pahasukam laba diya nohaki lesa samruddhi banku paddhathiya mulumaninma kada wati athi bawath hethema sandahan kaleya.siya hithawathunta naya labadima sandaha wathman amathiwaraya naya kondesi da lihil kara athayida pawasu ee mahatha ebawin naya gewima pahara hariyahoth nawatha eya ayakara ganimata kisidu kramayak nathayida pawasiya.me nisa niladharinda balawath apahasuthawayakata pathwa athayi pawasu jagath kumara mahatha mema ayatha kramawedaya pilibandawa dushana wimarshana komisamata mita desathiyakata pera paminili kalada methek eeta erehiwa kisidu kriyamargayak gena nathayida pawasiya.jagath kumara mahatha ema adahas pala kale eeye (13 da) baththaramulle pihiti ema sangam pradhana karyalaye pawathi madhya hamuwakadiya.-
